|c|☆Manatsu|flapple rescued me lmao
|c| xegrizzy|Tbh i was like wtf does flapple bring to this game
|c|☆IshaNn|i mean
|c| xegrizzy|in hindsight everything
|c|☆IshaNn|i didn't think you'd keep dragon dancing
|c|☆Manatsu|i had to
|c|☆IshaNn|bc if i swap to ninetales on any of the first 5 dragon dances
|c|☆IshaNn|i win
|c|☆Manatsu|because grav apple
|c| xegrizzy|the sitrus ripen i had no clue till now
|c|☆IshaNn|so i didn't think you'd keep going
|c|☆Manatsu|can only OHKO
|c|☆Manatsu|thunderus
|c|☆Manatsu|at 6
|c|☆IshaNn|has a chance at 5
|c|☆Manatsu|yeah, i didnt wanna risk it
|l| xegrizzy
|c|☆IshaNn|also outrage kills thundo earlier
|c|☆IshaNn|and if you had sucker punch it has a roll to kill at 4

|c|☆IshaNn|this is true
|c|☆Manatsu|it you swapped out to ninetails
|c|☆Manatsu|at any point

|c|☆Manatsu|since i can take one freeze dry
|c|☆IshaNn|you def 2ohko

|c|☆IshaNn|you 100% 2ohko after 2 dds
